title: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY I
subtitle: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY I
description: As a Part of the 75th Anniversary, The KSRI conducted a two day "National Seminar on Arts and Architecture" on 21st and 22nd of August 2023 in collaboration with The Samskrita Academy, Madras.  Dr. R. K. Raghavan, President of the KSRI delivered the Welcome address. Śilpakalāratnam Dr. T. Satyamurthy, Former Superintending Archaeologist, ASI, Chennai, delivered the inaugural address on 21st Augutst 2023 .

title: SANSKRIT DAY CELEBRATIONS at RAJ BHAVAN
subtitle: Dr. V. Kameswari (former Director of the Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute) honored by the Governor of Tamil Nadu
description:
Dr. V.Kameswari (Former Director of the Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute) was honored with an award by the governor for her distinguished service to the field of Sanskrit and Indological research.
The Samskruta Bharati, Tamil Nadu organized a Samskruta Day celebration on August 19 2024 at the Bharatiyar Mandapam at Raj Bhavan, Guindy. Thiru. R.N. Ravi, Governor of Tamil Nadu was the Chief Guest and awarded various Sanskrit scholars and experts for their distinguished services to the field of Sanskrit.
venue: Bharatiyar Mandapam at Raj Bhavan, Guindy

title: Studies on Rig Veda - Pancha Bhutas (Five Basic Elements)"
subtitle: Dr. T.V. Vasudeva delivered a lecture on Introduction to Rigveda
description: Dr.T.V. Vasudeva (Deputy Director, The KSRI) co-ordinated Sastra prakashika trust endowment programme on " Studies on Rig Veda - Pancha Bhutas (Five Basic Elements)" at The Madras Sanskrit College, Mylapore.  In the first session of the programme, He also gave a talk on "Introduction to Rigveda".

title: 75th ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATIONS -  VALEDICTORY FUNCTION
subtitle: 75th ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATIONS -  VALEDICTORY FUNCTION
description:
The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute is celebrating its 75th anniversary. To commemorate this milestone the Institute organized various National Workshops, Seminars and Lectures on various subjects like Bhakti, Art& Architecture, Sanskrit Literature, Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy. 
The Valedictory Function of the 75th Anniversary Celebrations will be celebrated on 13th Sepetember, 2024 at 5.00pm at The Madras Sanskrit College Premises.

Dr. N. Gopalaswami IAS(Retd.) will preside over the function and release the book "ŚEṢASAMHITĀ" and honor the prominent donors.

Dr. S. Ramaratnam , Chancellor, Jagadguru Kripalu University, Odisha will deliver the Valedictory address.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: TRAYI
subtitle: KSRI Faculty members invited as resource persons at TRAYI - A three-day event conducted by The Madras Sanskrit College
description:
On day 1 Session I of Palm-leaf reading, Dr. T.V. Vasudeva, Dy. Director, The KSRI  delivered a lecture on "Introduction of Manuscript & Script Knowledge" followed by a theory and practical presentation on "Handling & Preserving the manuscripts" by Smt. J. Lalitha, Librarian, KSRI, in Session III.

Dr. K.S. Balasubramanian, Director, KSRI was invited as the Chief Guest for the Valedictory function of Day 1 of TRAYI and delivered the valedictory address.

Enlightening the traditional Vedic students about Cataloguing in libraries, on Day 3, Session I of TRAYI, Smt. J. Lalitha spoke about "Ancient Subject Classification System & Cataloguing Card Entries"

title: NARASIMHACHARI ENDOWMENT - SANSKRIT RECITATION COMPETITION
subtitle: NARASIMHACHARI ENDOWMENT 2024 - SANSKRIT RECITATION COMPETITION
description: Under the Narasimhachari endownment, The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute conducted a Sanskrit Sloka recitation Competition  on 25th October 2024. Around 40 students from various city schools actively participated  in the competition and recited 20 shlokas from either SUBRAMHANYA BHUJANGAM or  SAUNDARYA LAHARI.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI
